title: Even Parity Checker for DWord
name: LGF_IsParityEven
description: The function checks whether the parity of the input variable of type DWord is even.

input.name: doubleWord
input.description: Variable for which the parity is to be determined.

return_value.description: TRUE: When the number of bits that are assigned `TRUE` is even

description_zh: 该函数用于检查一个双字（DWord）输入变量的奇偶性，并返回一个布尔值。如果输入变量中设置为`TRUE`的位数是偶数，则返回`TRUE`，否则返回`FALSE`。函数使用了位操作来计算输入变量的奇偶性，并且不使用ENO机制进行错误处理。
